text:
"Yoshi's Woolly World" (known as "Yoshi Wool World" in Japan) is a side-scrolling platform video game. It was developed by Good-Feel and published by Nintendo. The game was released on 26 June 2015 in Europe, Fall 2015 in North America, Summer 2015 in Japan, and on 25 June 2015 in Australia. It will be released for the Wii U. "Yoshi's Woolly World" will be the first "Yoshi" video game to be released on a home console since "Yoshi's Story" was release for the Nintendo 64 in 1997.
The game was announced by Nintendo CEO Satoru Iwata on 23 January 2013 under the name "Yarn Yoshi". It supports Amiibo figurines. A new line of Amiibo made out of yarn will be released. Nintendo is planning to release three Yoshi Amiibo in pink, green, and blue.
A stage in "Super Smash Bros. for Wii U" is based on "Yoshi's Woolly World".

annotations.surface_form: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U
